column1: If only what is not prohibited by Section 26 can be deducted under Section 25,
Although  this  Court’s  attention  was  drawn  by  the  appellant  in  that  case  to
Usher’s Wiltshire Brewery Ltd., vs. Bruce and several other English authorities,

Income  Tax,  in  which  the  structure  and  semantics  of  section  10(1)(f)  and  12
(1)(f) were similar to section 25(1)(k) and section 26(2) of the Inland Revenue Act
